articles.author: , Austin American-Statesman
articles.title: Video of Uvalde Robb Elementary school shooting shows police response - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The delayed law enforcement response to the Uvalde school shooting at Robb Elementary plays out in the video as 77 minutes tick by.
articles.content: Editor's note: The video footage, audio, and events described in this story are disturbing. Discretion is advised. This exclusive story and video are being made available free of charge as a public s… [+7552 chars]
